keyword: calories in sausage egg and cheese mcgriddle
title: Calories in Sausage Egg and Cheese McGriddle
meta_description: Discover calories in sausage egg and cheese mcgriddle, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in Sausage Egg and Cheese McGriddle
assumptions: McDonald's standard Sausage, Egg & Cheese McGriddle; includes sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese, and maple-flavored griddle cakes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and preparation; values based on standard McDonald's data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Sausage, Egg & Cheese McGriddle provides 550 kcal, 20 g protein, and 44 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sausage egg and cheese McGriddle?
faqs.a: Approximately 550 kcal for one standard sandwich.

faqs.q: What's the protein in sausage egg and cheese McGriddle?
faqs.a: About 20 g of protein per McGriddle.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a sausage egg and cheese McGriddle?
faqs.a: Around 1230 mg, mostly from sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in McGriddle sandwiches?
faqs.a: Yes, 44 g total carbs, including 15 g sugars from the maple griddle cakes.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in sausage egg and cheese McGriddle?
faqs.a: Standard values assume fresh preparation; custom toasting or add-ons can increase calories.
